metadata.title: CVE-2017-17515 on Ubuntu 20.04 LTS (focal) - low
metadata.description: ** DISPUTED ** etc/ObjectList in Metview 4.7.3 does not validate stringsbefore launching the program specified by the BROWSER environment variable,which might allow remote attackers to conduct argument-injection attacksvia a crafted URL. NOTE: a third party has indicated that the code toaccess this environment variable is not enabled in the shipped product.

criterions.comment: metview package in focal is affected and needs fixing.
